title: Harris Corporation Declares Quarterly Dividend
text:
MELBOURNE, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- The Board of Directors of Harris Corporation (NYSE:HRS) has declared a quarterly cash dividend of 57 cents per share on the common stock, payable March 21, 2018, to shareholders of record March 8, 2018.
About Harris Corporation
Harris Corporation is a leading technology innovator, solving customersâ€™ toughest mission-critical challenges by providing solutions that connect, inform and protect. Harris supports government and commercial customers in more than 100 countries and has approximately $6 billion in annual revenue. The company is organized into three business segments: Communication Systems, Electronic Systems and Space and Intelligence Systems. Learn more at harris.com .
